person.persName: Robert Armstrong Athey (Covington, Kentucky, attorney and soldier)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, attorney and soldier. Lexington, Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth J. Wallace Athey until November 1860. Married to Mary Katherine Stephens Athey on January 17, 1865. Educated at Transylvania University. Read law under Chief-Justice George Robertson. Graduated from Transylvania Law School in 1845. Member of the Presbyterian Church. Member of the Lexington City Council in 1849. City attorney for Lexington from 1849 to 1850. Represented Fayette County in the Kentucky House of Representatives from 1850 to 1851. Moved to Covington in 1855. County attorney for Kenton County from 1864 to 1865.
